title: "Diagnoss launches AI assistant to reduce medical coding errors"
excerpt: "Diagnoss has developed an AI-based coding assistant to help automate the painstaking process of medical coding and billing. The tool works similarly to the Grammarly AI grammar-checking tool. Here's why the company believes its tool is even more critical to help with proper coding and payment during the COVID-19 pandemic."
